parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark message(s) as read when fetched

mapper.input:
You will receive an email about a job opportunity or potencial job opportunity: {{1.subject}}, {{1.text}}. You must summarize the email, fetching the most important points, like what the email is about, the company, the oppotunity and others things that you judge important. This task is of the most importance, so please, do it carefully! 
Make the response short and precise, please; also always respond in portuguese-Br.

nested.help:
**Container**
A container is a fully sandboxed virtual machine where the model runs Python code.

**Expiration Time**
Containers expire if unused for 20 minutes. The expiration timer is reset after any operation on the container.
nested.name: container_type
nested.label: Container type

mappable.help: Map the container ID. For example: `cntr_6878d51b5ffc8191b7c32c11c747cf4e`.

spec.help: An optional list of uploaded files to make available to your code.
spec.name: file_ids

nested.name: description
